name: Go Outside (Larry Makes Games)
description:
'Go Outside' is a game about a guy who has social anxiety and his asked by his mum to complete a set of mundane tasks outside the house.

This was made for a university project. The project needed to embed meaning and narrative into a game. Specifically the meaning needed to be portrayed through mechanics.

Some parts are a little broken but this was made in a short period time, sorry about that!
